channel.title: Pre-Public Beta 2 Bugs
channel.description: Archived bugs reported in Public Beta 1 and 1a. Forum closed for posting.

item.title: Post GPFs here
item.author: invalid@example.com (Da Spadger)
item.dc:creator: Da Spadger
item.content:encoded:
Post reoccuring GPFs here

Ok, if you get a GPF that you know occurs at the same place in UTXMP, then copy the text in the GPF window and post it here.

UT2004 Build UT2004_Build_[2005-02-15_17.02]

OS: Windows XP 5.1 (Build: 2600)
CPU: GenuineIntel Unknown processor @ 2394 MHz with 511MB RAM
Video: RADEON 9500 PRO / 9700 (6525)

XMPGunnerRed XMP-CrashFlight.XMPGunnerRed (Function XGame.xPawn.PlayDying:0000) Infinite script recursion (250 calls) detected

History:...
Click to expand...
Post GPFs here

item.title: Critical error
item.author: invalid@example.com (sid3000)
item.dc:creator: sid3000
item.content:encoded:
all my ut2004 mods works fine, utxmp seems to crashed on start , the zip and exe installation gives the same result.
what am i missing.

item.title: I18n (Internationalisation)
item.author: invalid@example.com (Ravu al Hemio)
item.dc:creator: Ravu al Hemio
item.content:encoded:
Hello UTXMP developers and community,

I am new to UTXMP even though I do hang around in the BU forums from time to time. First, I would like to thank Free Monkey for reviving U2XMP in such high quality -- well done there! I somehow prefer it over Onslaught, since it has more items and more tactics.

I decided to have a go at a German translation (ucc dumpint being a loyal friend), and I am far enough. Unfortunately, some of the strings are forced-English. An example is...

I18n (Internationalisation)

item.title: gas
item.author: invalid@example.com (nitrous{e})
item.dc:creator: nitrous{e}
item.content:encoded:
I'm getting the impression (hoping) patch 1b isn't far away now, so this may be my last chance to have a rant...

I'm totally gonna get flamed for this - but the gas grenade just ain't what it used to be and I've seen nothing in the changelog hinting it's gonna change.

Used to play U2XMP a lot. I play from New Zealand so lag is a problem (which isn't gonna change till sombody disproves Einstein). This meant playing ranger was a bit of a joke, try sniping with a lag of 200! Gunner & tech...

gas

item.title: random notes on 1a
item.author: invalid@example.com (...andrelax)
item.dc:creator: ...andrelax
item.content:encoded:
1. turrets don't change team / die if player changes team
2. please tell bots they can double-jump to save themselves if they fall off a great height
3. please make bots a bit less adept with the vehicle guns!

item.title: Spawning at enemy deploy points
item.author: invalid@example.com (aeqos38/5)
item.dc:creator: aeqos38/5
item.content:encoded: If you change teams right before you are about to spawn and the spawnpoint pillar is spinning the fastest, you can effectively spawn to an enemy deploy point. Hard bug to reproduce, but quite an exploit.

item.title: land mines not working?
item.author: invalid@example.com (theomniproject)
item.dc:creator: theomniproject
item.content:encoded:
ok... just got adara on bbf and someone pointed out that while you can use landmines in the level, if you use them in the cave where the arti node is, they get deployed and then blow up right away. i have also noticed this on rgb (i assumed cause low grav) and in wonderwoods in the base. just wanted to know if it was something i could do... thanks... oh and also if anyone know how to make custom jump pads for adara that would be awesome cause modifying the jump z does not do the trick for...

land mines not working?

item.title: Trapped in Alcazar
item.author: invalid@example.com (nitrous{e})
item.dc:creator: nitrous{e}
item.content:encoded: Has this map bug been found/fixed? Jumped of platform above clouds in Alcazar, to right of the exit from the spire. Rode the cliff face down and got trapped at the bottom. See screen shot attached.

item.title: Two bugs with the Sniper rifle
item.author: invalid@example.com (Da Spadger)
item.dc:creator: Da Spadger
item.content:encoded:
Firstly, the bullet never hits if you shoot at an extreme range, you see an enemy clearly in the scope and fire. Nothing happens. First when you get closer the bullet hits.

Secondly, the bullet cause quiet some momentum to vehicles (at least the raptor) It should be toned down imo. It is just a bullet after all.

Luckily for me, i prefer the Tech class over Ranger and Gunner.

item.title: Problem with the Vid
item.author: invalid@example.com ({NB}Fire)
item.dc:creator: {NB}Fire
item.content:encoded: at the end of the teaser vid i get like a load of code/funny stuff should it be there of is it my computer any one know ??

item.title: Weapon Viewing Bug
item.author: invalid@example.com (fstm20)
item.dc:creator: fstm20
item.content:encoded:
Hi. I have a GeForce FX5200 and a Pentium 3.06 Ghz with HT.

I have patched UT2004 to version 3355.

I have patched the beta UTXMP properly.

When I play Instant Action, the weapon view (the hands and the gun) is skewed 90 degrees in my field of view and blocks off the lower third to lower half off the screen. So instead of pointing to the target point, the weapon graphics point left out of sight. The weapons work properly, but it's sometimes hard to see the target. The shotgun is...

Weapon Viewing Bug

item.title: Vid card Problem...
item.author: invalid@example.com (theomniproject)
item.dc:creator: theomniproject
item.content:encoded:
ok... this is not directly related to utxmp... but i am having some strange issues. i just upgraded from a 128meg radeon 9200 to a 256meg geforce 6600 and see basiclally no real imrpovement on fps for either utxmp or ut2k4... on ons-torlan with everything set to normal and all options off except dyanamic lighting, i am still getting under 20 fps when looking out over the level, if there is any improvement it is only by a 4 or five frames from maby 11-12 up to 16-17. i really thought that...

Vid card Problem...

item.title: Giant turrets cost me points!
item.author: invalid@example.com (GotBeer?)
item.dc:creator: GotBeer?
item.content:encoded:
OK, don't know if this is anywhere else because I'm lazy. I'm running around right now on Sunset Beach, ALONE, and I just blew up the two giant turrets. I lost 900 points on each one, 600 for destroying giant turret x 1.50 for killing teammate(?) What's up with that? And why is noone else playing? And why is my beer suddenly empty? C'mon people! My wife and child are out of town for the night, I finally have a chance to play again!

Oh yeah, it's about 7:20 Central USA.

item.title: UTXMP and FPS?
item.author: invalid@example.com (theomniproject)
item.dc:creator: theomniproject
item.content:encoded:
I have been working on a conversion map pack for utxmp and have just found something disturbing. anyone who has played Hall of Giants knows that it really sux for FPS. i wanted to try to find out why... i know about the zoning issues but it ran great in the origional UT. i opened and played the origional CTF and ONS versions ut2k4 with 8 bots and the low grav mutator, i got 25-30+ FPS and it would sometimes drop to 20 if up high looking across the whole level. so i thought to myself maby i...

UTXMP and FPS?

item.title: Voice chat???
item.author: invalid@example.com (theomniproject)
item.dc:creator: theomniproject
item.content:encoded: ok... in ut2004 voice chat is automaticly eneabled from within ut2004, so you can chat without using an outside program as far as i know. so far i have not been able to do the same in utmxp. dont know how hard it would be to change that but it ouwld be cool to chat witout having to use yahoo n such. will/can that be changed?

item.title: LAAAAAAGGGGG!!!!
item.author: invalid@example.com (theomniproject)
item.dc:creator: theomniproject
item.content:encoded:
ok... this is a question about lag. i have noticed more than usual lag on some maps that i have conveted to utxmp and was wondering the cause of it. mainly it happens on islandhop and urban (hall of giants is just a laggy map because of zoning) the versions for ut2k4 run perty well even with lots of people 20+ but when u get more than 8 in utxmp it starts to lag for most ppl. is utxmp just more prone to lagging cause of deployables n such or is it becasue i put too many vehicles, or is it...

LAAAAAAGGGGG!!!!

item.title: BR-Canyon Mismatch?
item.author: invalid@example.com (theomniproject)
item.dc:creator: theomniproject
item.content:encoded:
OK... for some reason bbf and bloodrave have different versions of the BR-Canyon file that i think is related to the map fox. not only does it take a long ass time to download but when you want to go the the other server you cant because you get a br-canyon version mismatch error. now i know that you only have to go into your ut2k4 folder and delete the file, but thats only cause i took the time to find out. we should make this as idiot proof as possible. i just dont know who need to fix...

BR-Canyon Mismatch?

item.title: More bugs...
item.author: invalid@example.com (Da Spadger)
item.dc:creator: Da Spadger
item.content:encoded:
- When playing as tech and you scroll through the weapons it gets stuck between auto-turret and rocket-turret. Doesn't matter how many times you scroll, you have to press a number key to get back to shotgun, AR etc

- When reloading the Rangers pistol, you see that the arm that pushes the new magasine in goes up a bit to far and you see that the arm suddenly ends.

Suggestion: The weapons should be louder. They sound kinda wimpy atm. :/

item.title: Super zoom bug/exploit
item.author: invalid@example.com ({BK}Gileren)
item.dc:creator: {BK}Gileren
item.content:encoded:
Not sure if this has been mentioned or not but i found a bug, or more of an exploit if i might say so.

what the bug/exploit does is it allows you to get the zoom of a sniper rifle with any other Ranger weapon.

exact steps:
1) pick ranger class
2) select sniper rifle
3) fire 1 or 2 shots off (doesn't matter where)
4) hit reload after 1-2 shots have been expended
5) right after you hit reload use mousewheel or hit 2-5 to select another weapon
6) the sniper rifle will get done...

Super zoom bug/exploit

item.title: various errors related to the menu system of utxmp.
item.author: invalid@example.com (Dandeloreon1984)
item.dc:creator: Dandeloreon1984
item.content:encoded:
to start off with, i am doing mutators of my own, but on my log that is mutator free i found some errors.

the test i did was a simple 40 seconds of play then a quit command out of utxmp.

before i could even get out of the gate and into my map, in the small intro, i got this:
Code:
Warning: Failed to load 'UniPsychos_Tex': Can't find file for package 'UniPsychos_Tex'
Warning: Failed to load 'Material UniPsychos_Tex.Antix.antix_portrait': Can't find file for package 'UniPsychos_Tex'...
various errors related to the menu system of utxmp.
